text: @JohnCornyn @WSJ 85 babies have #coronavirus in Nueces County, some have passed away. Children are NOT immune. If you were worried about children's education we wouldn't be ranked 43rd in the country. Expand wi-fi access, don't force kids into classes #CorpusChristi #COVID #TexasCOVID
